                left: List {

                                        span: Span(

                                        name: "a",

                                ),
                            ),

                            key: None,

                                        span: Span(
                                            3,
                                            9,
                                        ),
                                        name: "b",
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                        },
                    ],
                },
                span: Span(
                    3,

                ),

                    SimpleVariable(

                            span: Span(
                                3,

                            ),

                        },

            },
